Database Design.


== Details ==

=== Tables ===

Account
 * Account ID
 * Account Name
 * Segment1 {{{signifies what account type it is: Asset (01) or Liability (02) or Owners Equity (03)}}}
 * Segment2
 * Description

Journal
 * Journal ID
 * Date
 * Amount
 * DR Account
 * CR Account
 * Description

=== Relationships ===

Journal.DR Account = Account.Account ID<BR>
Journal.CR Account = Account.Account ID
